name: SOUL JANITOR (itch)
description:
In SOUL JANITOR you play as a janitor who was contracted into cleaning out an old thought to be abandoned warehouse. You quickly find out that there is much more to this warehouse than a few dirty bathrooms. Armed with only your spray bottle, you must fight your way through the warehouse to complete your contract and unravel the mysteries of the facility along the way.



Key Features:

- Explore a detailed environment

- Fight unique spirit enemies

- Solve puzzles and find tapes to unravel the mystery

- NO SAVE :)))))
